entry.title: Today in DeFi - Mantle Mainnet Live, UniswapX Live, Testnet Yield Trading, and more...
entry.summary: Mantle Mainnet Live Built by BitDAO, Mantle L2 mainnet alpha is now live, as well as the BIT-MNT conversion tool. Mantle also launches a grants program and an EcoFund to support developments. The next step for Mantle is to build mntETH - Mantle's LSD product.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Aave GHO Live, Stader ETHx Live, Ripple Wins SEC Case, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of July 10th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Ripple Wins SEC Case, Polygon POL Token, Leveraged Lending, and more...
entry.summary: Ripple Wins SEC Case After a year long of dispute between Ripple and the SEC on whether the XRP token is a security, a US judge ruled that institutional XRP sales were investment contracts, but programmatic sales were not. "The programmatic portion of the ruling could have broad impact for other crypto tokens, though the

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Starknet v0.12 Mainnet, Kava 14 Live, Leverage Trading on Optimism, ...
entry.summary: Starknet v0.12 Mainnet Starknet launches the v0.12 upgrade to its mainnet, increases throughput by 10x, and marks the Quant Leap upgrade's beginning - providing enhanced performance and scalability. Kava 14 Live Kava 14 is live on mainnet. The ‘internal bridge’ in the upgrade enables users to transfer native IBC assets from Cosmos to EVM ecosystems.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - ConsenSys Linea Alpha, Rodeo Exploit, Native BTC Bridging, ...
entry.summary: Linea Mainnet Alpha ConsenSys L2 Linea launches mainnet alpha and starts to onboard launch partners. Linea will open the network to the public next week at EthCC. In the launch post, Linea claims there is no token as it uses ETH as the network currency.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Stader ETHx Live, Swaap V2 Live, Make esGMX Liquid, and more...
entry.summary: Stader ETHx Live Stader launches ETHx along with $1M in launch incentives. The incentives include a 1.5x staking boost, 800k in LP rewards, and rewards for DAOs & communities. Swaap V2 Live Market-making protocol Swaap launches v2 on Ethereum and Polygon. V2 introduces enhancements for LPs, such as optimized market-making strategies, partnerships with institutions, incentives for early participation, etc.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Multichain Stopped Services, Blur V2 Live, Compound Encumber, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of July 3rd

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Multichain Hacked, SEC Going After DeFi, Quest to Earn, and more...
entry.summary: Multichain Stops All Services Multichain was hacked and has announced it has stopped all services. All bridge transactions will be stuck on the source chain with unknown resume time. Earlier today Multichain bridge contracts saw major outflows due to potential exploits. “

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Blur V2 Live, Surge Live on Arbitrum, Earn on Liquidity, and more...
entry.summary: Blur V2 Live NFT marketplace Blur launches V2, enabling 50% gas reduction and trait bidding for NFTs. Surge Live on Arbitrum Surge is now live on Arbitrum. Surge is a lending protocol for longtail assets, built by the founder of Inverse. Pendle Live on BnB Chain

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Sommelier Morpho Integration, PancakeSwap on Polygon zkEVM, Crosschain Trading, and more...
entry.summary: Sommelier Morpho Integration Yield protocol Sommelier integrates Morpho to launch the RYETH and RYUSD vaults, using Morphon's optimizer to enhance returns. PancakeSwap on Polygon zkEVM PancakeSwap has been deployed on Polygon zkEVM (with swap feature supported) and joined Linea's testnet campaign.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Archway L1 Live, stUSDT Live, crvUSD, Borrowing on Curve, and more...
entry.summary: Archway L1 Live Archway, a Cosmos-based L1 with incentives for devs, has launched its mainnet. Archway plans to distribute a portion of the token emission directly to dApps. It will allocate 25% to devs and the remaining 75% to validators. stUSDT Live

entry.summary: Recap: Week of Jun 26th

entry.title: Today In DeFi - SMG Halts Ethereum (for 12s), Polygon 2.0 Architecture, Stable farms and more
entry.summary: SMG Halts Ethereum Special Mechanism Group "halted ethereum transactions” for 12 seconds, by exploiting PBS (proposer builder separation). SMG achieved this by proposing an empty block and outbidding others for block inclusion. In their thread, SMG argues for

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maple Launches Lending Desk, Aptos NFT Aggregator, Incentivized LPing and more
entry.summary: Maple Launches Lending Desk Undercollateralized CeDeFi lending platform Maple Finance is launching a lending desk. “We witnessed first-hand the shortcomings of CeFi last year and will raise the bar for lending desks through a commitment to compliance, transparency, and quality,” said Sidney Powell, CEO and co-founder of Maple Finance.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - CCTP Live on Arbitrum, Sudoswap Wrapped Pools, Good Farms and more...
entry.summary: CCTP on Arbitrum

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Introducing ZK Stack, WBTC & ETH Markets for crvUSD, Earn Fixed Rate on DAI, and more...
entry.summary: Matter Labs Introduces ZK Stack Matter Labs released the ZK Stack for building ‘Hyperchains’. Devs who build Hyperchains can choose to create Layer 2s that run parallel to zkSync Era, or Layer 3s that run on top of it. WBTC, ETH Markets for crvUSD Live

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Maker Savings DAI, Polygon POS to ZK L2, Regulation Updates, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of June 19th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Velodrome V2 Live, Prime Trust Halted Withdrawals, PENDLE Yield Boost, and more...
entry.summary: Velodrome V2 Live Velodrome launched V2 with a new VELO token. V2 enables new features including concentrated liquidity support, dynamic fees, dynamic emission rate, velodrome relay, enhanced UX, etc. V1 users will have about a week to migrate to V2 before the emission begins on V2 on June 29th.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - MakerDAO Savings DAI, Camelot AMM v3 Live, Stake to Yield, and more...
entry.summary: MakerDAO Savings DAI MakerDAO announces Savings DAI (sDAI), a tokenized version of DSR-enabled DAI. sDAI is now available on Spark Protocol by depositing DAI in exchange for sDAI. Camelot AMM v3 Live Arbitrum-based DEX Camelot launches its AMM V3, backed by Algebra’s concentrated liquidity engine and integrated with Paraswap.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Magpie Bridge Live, Dopex Option Scalps V2, Automated LPing, and more...
entry.summary: Magpie Bridge Live Magpie, a non-custodial cross-chain swap, goes live and supports transfers between seven chains. Magpie uses Wormhole's Guardian Network to communicate asset swap signals between blockchains, in order to offer secure, efficient bridging.
